attributes.action: Remove Boris Johnson from the position of Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs
attributes.background:
This country needs to be represented abroad by politicians who are statesmanlike. This role requires someone with gravitas: a person who thinks before they speak and does so with precision.

With his recent comments, Mr. Johnson demonstrated he lacks the basic skills required to fulfill this role.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Cabinet Ministers to be sacked.
